metadata.dc:author: Sáenz Rodríguez, Manuel

Loza Oropeza, David
Chian García, César
Verona Rubio, Róger
Barrós Baertl, Nicolás
Freundt Serpa, Natalia
metadata.dc:description: It is shown three cases of sclerosing peritonitis, two of them related to gastric adenocarcinoma and the other one associated to thecoma. The clinical picture comprised abdominal pain, ascites and intestinal occlusion. Key words: Sclerosing Peritonitis, Adenocarcinoma, Stomach, Signet Ring Cells, Krukenberg's Tumor, Thecoma, Intestinal Occlusion.
metadata.dc:title: Peritonitis esclerosante: presentación de tres casos.
[Sclerosing peritonitis: presentation of three cases].
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista de gastroenterologia del Peru : organo oficial de la Sociedad de Gastroenterologia del Peru
